snippet.title: Bootleg Steamer Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Bootleg Steamer is setting sail on April 25th 2024! Wishlist on Steam here: https://bit.ly/BootlegSteamer

Embark on your journey as a captain during the tumultuous times of the 1920's American Prohibition. You'll have to overcome challenges like the relentless Coast Guard pursuit, shrewd Mafia dealings, and your own financial pitfalls, all while ensuring your path to wealth remains...

Bootleg Steamer is a tactical trading roguelike game, where you must carefully strategize your gameplay to maximise your profits. With only a finite amount of time before the prohibition ends... Have you got what it takes to go reign as Prohibition King?

Wishlist Bootleg Steamer on Steam: https://bit.ly/BootlegSteamer

Join the Junkfish Discord to chat with developers and community: https://discord.gg/Junkfish

Keep up with Junkfish news and updates on our games by following our socials:
https://twitter.com/TeamJunkfish
https://instagram.com/TeamJunkfish
https://facebook.com/TeamJunkfish
https://tiktok.com/@TeamJunkfish
